title: Dynamic Installer
author: BlassGO
description: Helps automate installations for Recovery, Magisk, KSU, and more. It supports multi-architecture and provides extensive modding tools for seamless project management and large-scale modding on Android devices.

title: App Manager
author: BlassGO
description: A lightweight Android tool to retrieve detailed info on system and user apps, including status, ID, package, path, label and extract app icons via ADB, without the need for additional installations.

title: OMC Decoder
author: BlassGO
description: Magisk module to Decrypt CSC features on Any Samsung Device.
